Title: Relates to requiring parole violators to be transferred to state correctional facilities after 10 days in a local correctional facility
Summary: Requires parole violators, after 10 days in a local correctional facility, to either be transferred to state correctional facilities or remain in such local facility with all associated costs borne by the state; provides for a 20-day extension period.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to parole violators
